name: @mirulkhanall/rn-paddle-ocr
description: React Native package for OCR scanning using PaddleOCR models with multilingual support (Simplified/Traditional Chinese, English)

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p build/assets/exported_det build/assets/exported_rec && cp -r src/assets/exported_det/* build/assets/exported_det/ && cp -r src/assets/exported_rec/* build/assets/exported_rec/ && cp src/assets/character_dict.json build/assets/
scripts.test: echo "Run: node test.js after installing dependencies"
